text: I am a former student of Teacher Cindy. Teacher Cindy has always been an extremely caring and patient teacher. Over the 11 years of piano lessons with her, she opened up my musical universe. I explored many different genres of music with her, such as classical, jazz, ragtime and movie soundtracks. I always looked forward to attending my weekly lessons with her because there was always something new and enjoyable to learn. I am truly grateful that I had her as my teacher.

Teacher Cindy is a nurturing and dedicated music teacher who consistently goes above and beyond for her students. In a short time, I have seen significant improvements in my playing under her guidance. It has been an honour to complete my piano journey with her, and her inspiring lessons have truly deepened my love for music.

Teacher Cindy is a truly dedicated and passionate music teacher! She teaches both kids and adults with patience, care and passion. Whether you are learning classical or jazz, she makes every lesson engaging and tailored to your needs. Her deep musical knowledge and encouraging teaching style make her an outstanding choice for students of all levels. Highly recommended!

Teacher Cindy has been teaching me piano and music theory for almost a decade, and I have enjoyed every minute learning under her tutelage. Aside from being extremely knowledgeable and practical, she is also very patient and understanding. She has helped me develop my passion for music and I am really appreciative of everything she has done for me.

Cindy has been teaching me for about six months and she imparts good techniques and provides constructive feedback to students. A dedicated and knowledgeable teacher, her lessons are reasonably priced. She also inspires in me a love for music and piano.
